recipesJson.name: Kiwi Melon Cloud Nurdz - Clone/Remix
recipesJson.author: Sublimeice
recipesJson.description:
Using the strap-on base I made here -----> https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/187091#kiwi_trinity_by_sublimeice 

This flavor was too good to not have its own recipe. So here it is!

Wild Melon flv covers the good melon flavor that cloud nurdz has. The kiwi triple mix covers the kiwi end their juice has. Really good off the shake. Definitely a SnV recipe.
